title: [New Account]Didnt get champion shards?
body:
Hi guys I made a league account yesterday and I just logged in and a prompt told me that I receieved 2 free champion shards and a skin shard and to start crafting however when I opened the box all it gave me was star guardian lux skin shard. 

is this a bug or as intendend??

replies.body: Holy moly you got some really good stuff through hextech for being a new account!!  Grats on all that good stuff.  :D  It looks like you did get your new player chest, but you don't have a key at the moment.  You used the extra key you had on the mastery chest you earned earlier instead of the new player chest.  You'll have to grab some key fragments or buy a key to open your chest.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Ahhhhhhhhhh I see. I got Unmasked Kayle from the other chest haha. Thanks a bunch :)
